decks.notes: Utilizing fast mana and card selection spells, this deck aims to quickly dump powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Archon of Cruelty into the graveyard, then bring them back onto the battlefield for huge value. The deck runs a suite of reanimation spells like Animate Dead and Reanimate, along with disruption in the form of Unmask and Thoughtseize to protect the combo. The deck also includes cards like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Borborygmos Enraged to provide alternate win conditions or additional utility.

The main goal of this deck is to quickly fill up your graveyard with big creatures using cards like Entomb and Griselbrand, and then bring them back onto the battlefield with cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead. Additionally, disruption is key with cards like Thoughtseize and Cabal Therapy to protect your combo pieces. The deck also has the flexibility to bring out creatures like Archon of Cruelty or Atraxa, Grand Unifier to control the board and gain advantage. Overall, this deck aims to win the game by overwhelming the opponent with powerful creatures.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana and locking down opponent's spells with Chalice of the Void and Blood Moon effects. The goal is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while utilizing powerful dragons like Broadside Bombardiers and Pyrogoyf to apply pressure and quickly close out games. The deck also includes versatile removal spells like Sundering Eruption and Fury to deal with threats efficiently. With a mix of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents and secure victory through its efficient gameplay.

The deck revolves around generating infinite mana using cards like Basalt Monolith and Grim Monolith, along with support from cards like Voltaic Key and Manifold Key. Mystic Forge allows the player to cast cards from the top of their library, enabling them to assemble their combo pieces quickly. Cards like Tezzeret, Cruel Captain and Karn, the Great Creator provide additional utility and synergy with artifacts. The goal is to quickly assemble the combo pieces and generate a win condition like Kozilek's Command or Ugin, the Eye of the Storms to finish off the opponent.

The main concept of this Dragon Stompy deck is to disrupt opponents' mana bases with cards like Blood Moon, Magus of the Moon, and Chalice of the Void, while also applying pressure with aggressive creatures like Fury and Pyrogoyf. The deck aims to quickly close out games by playing powerful threats like Broadside Bombardiers and Sundering Eruption. Additionally, cards like Urza's Saga and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker provide additional value and synergies with the rest of the deck. Overall, the deck focuses on a proactive game plan and punishing opponents' reliance on non-basic lands.

This deck revolves around using Mystic Forge to play artifacts for free from the top of your library. By using cards like Manifold Key and Voltaic Key, you can untap artifacts and generate infinite mana with Grim Monolith. Tezzeret, Cruel Captain and Karn, the Great Creator provide additional utility and win conditions. The goal is to assemble the necessary pieces to create a powerful board state and overwhelm your opponent with a combination of artifacts and powerful abilities. The synergy between cards like Urza's Tower and The One Ring also provides ramp and card advantage to support the combo engine.

The deck focuses on utilizing artifact ramp and card draw to quickly assemble a combo involving Mystic Forge and various artifact mana rocks to generate infinite mana and casting spells from the top of your library.
The deck also utilizes Karn, the Great Creator to shutdown opponent's artifacts and Ugin, the Eye of the Storms for additional card draw and control.
The goal of the deck is to quickly amass a powerful board state and overwhelm the opponent with a strong combo finish.

The main idea of this deck is to quickly get powerful creatures into the graveyard using cards like Entomb and Thoughtseize, then bring them back onto the battlefield with Reanimate and Animate Dead to overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes control elements like Force of Will and Daze to protect the combo pieces and disrupt opponents' strategies. Additionally, there are versatile cards like Brazen Borrower and Murktide Regent that can provide additional threats or disruption when needed. The deck aims to efficiently combo off while maintaining control of the game.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with key creatures using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, then utilizing powerful spells like Archon of Cruelty and Murktide Regent to bring those creatures back onto the battlefield. It also includes a control aspect with cards like Force of Will and Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The inclusion of Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Atraxa, Grand Unifier provides card advantage and extra value. The deck aims to efficiently combo off and overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats while disrupting their plans.

The main concept of this deck is to control the tempo of the game by disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Thoughtseize, Daze, and Force of Will, while deploying efficient threats like Brazen Borrower, Murktide Regent, and Nethergoyf to pressure the opponent and close out the game quickly. The deck also includes card draw and manipulation spells like Brainstorm and Ponder to ensure consistency and smooth gameplay. Additionally, the mana base is optimized for a mix of blue and black spells, with utility lands like Wasteland and Undercity Sewers for added disruption.

This Dragon Stompy deck focuses on quickly dropping powerful threats like Magus of the Moon and Broadside Bombardiers to disrupt the opponent's mana base while utilizing aggressive elements like Fury and Pyrogoyf to finish off the game quickly. The deck also uses disruptive cards like Chalice of the Void and Blood Moon to further disrupt the opponent's strategy, while utilizing cards like The One Ring and Urza's Saga for additional resource generation and card advantage. Overall, the deck aims to lock down the opponent and overwhelm them with powerful threats.

The main idea of the deck is to quickly ramp up mana using Chrome Mox, Simian Spirit Guide, Ancient Tomb, and City of Traitors to cast powerful dragons such as Fury and Shatterskull Smashing, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with Chalice of the Void, Magus of the Moon, and Blood Moon. The deck also has some removal options like Sundering Eruption and Lavaspur Boots. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays and lockdown effects, ultimately leading to victory by overpowering them with strong creatures and disruptive enchantments.

The deck focuses on quickly filling your graveyard with key creatures using cards like Thoughtseize, Entomb, and Reanimate, while also controlling the game with counterspells like Force of Will and Daze. By efficiently utilizing graveyard recursion and card advantage with Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student, players can create powerful board states and overwhelm their opponents. The deck also includes Murktide Regent and Atraxa, Grand Unifier as threats that can quickly close out games. Wasteland is included to disrupt the opponent's mana base, while Brazen Borrower provides additional flexibility and disruption.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying powerful Eldrazi creatures while disrupting the opponent with cards like Chalice of the Void and Wasteland. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures while controlling the game with disruptive spells. The Eldrazi creatures like Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer provide a strong threat that can rapidly close out the game. The deck also includes cards like Eye of Ugin and Eldrazi Temple to help accelerate the casting of these powerful creatures. It is a fast-paced aggressive strategy that aims to overpower the opponent quickly.

The key concept of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan by using disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Smallpox, along with land destruction from Wasteland. The deck also utilizes powerful planeswalkers like Liliana of the Veil for control and Karn, the Great Creator for utility. The deck aims to control the board and resources while applying pressure with Mishra's Factory and Orcish Bowmasters. Additionally, it includes unique artifacts like Urza's Saga and Retrofitter Foundry to generate value and create a difficult board state for the opponent to deal with.

The main focus of the deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, and then bring them back into play for an explosive combo finish. It also includes disruptive elements like Thoughtseize and Daze to control the game and protect the combo pieces. The powerful creatures like Murktide Regent and Archon of Cruelty provide a fast clock for the opponent once they hit the battlefield. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student helps dig for key pieces, while cards like Brainstorm and Ponder provide card selection and manipulation.
